name: Cars.io
description:
Drive a car and drop your opponent outside!
If you can survive to the very end you are the winner!

Sometimes you take a star appearing in the field, you will be in a powerful mode for a certain amount of time. Strength to hit the opponent will be strengthened, please positively aim at the opponent and drop it.

There are three types of fields at all! By winning you can proceed to the next field. Drive in all fields aiming for victory.
